params.name: inputs
params.description: The pipeline handles three types of images:A string containing a HTTP(s) link pointing to an imageA string containing a local path to an imageAn image loaded in PIL directlyThe pipeline accepts either a single image or a batch of images.

params.name: max_new_tokens
params.description: The amount of maximum tokens to generate. By default it will use generate default.

params.name: generate_kwargs
params.description: Pass it to send all of these arguments directly to generate allowing full control of this function.

params.name: timeout
params.description: The maximum time in seconds to wait for fetching images from the web. If None, no timeout is set andthe call may block forever.

return: A list or a list of list of dict
